text: Saul Bernard Marantz (July 11, 1911 – January 17, 1997) was an American musician, inventor, and engineer who founded audio manufacturer Marantz in 1948. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:1997 deaths Category:American Jews Category:American audio engineers Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Musicians from New York City Category:People from Bridgewater Township, New Jersey Category:Engineers from New York (state) Category:Engineers from New Jersey Category:20th-century American engineers Category:20th-century American inventors
title: Saul Marantz
